---

## Goal

What user confusion or gap does this solve?

## Deliverable

- [ ] README update
- [ ] New example in `examples/`
- [ ] Notebook or script validating real-world usage

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] Instructions are runnable.
- [ ] API names and outputs are accurate.
- [ ] Links and commands are up to date.

## Notes

If possible, include expected audience (new users, advanced users, integrators, etc.).
